code: export default function updateReducer(dispatchFn){return function(field){let setValueFn=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;return function(event){let value=event.target.value;let newValue=setValueFn?setValueFn(value):value;dispatchFn({type:"set",payload:{[field]:newValue}});};};}
